page.title: 08EVENTS
page.content:
EVENTS STANTON HARCOURT
{GALA DAY} Held in lst week of June as an activity/carnival day for the whole village. Started to commemorate the Queens Jubilee and has continued. Procession of floats from village groups and fancy dress parade. Supervised by Gala Queen selected from village girls. {HARVEST SUPPER}3 course meal provided by Womens Institute at end of September for all village. 95 tickets sold this year. Meal followed by entertainment. {DISCO/DANCES} Various discos thoughout the year usually for Charity. {PIE SUPPER} Held in Old Kitchen of Manor House to raise funds for church, Shepherds Pie, Pie and cream and wine. Most enjoyable function. 70 villagers attended.
